channel.title: Pro-Pk Web Devopment team needed
channel.description:
Hey guys! [center][size=18pt]To start off, my name is Brian and this is what im doing![/size][/center]
[center][size=14pt]I am running an apache server and need some guys who know what they are doing when it comes to php and css. I do have a 317 ready to go and i think its fantastic. So this is the only thing I have left. It doesnt have to be amazing but decent.[/size][/center]
[center]Here is some proof of the server and apache server. I know its not much, but its enough.[/center]
[IMG]http://i667.photobucket.com/albums/vv34/3m0h4x/proofofweb.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i667.photobucket.com/albums/vv34/3m0h4x/proofofserverwork.jpg[/img]
I might need one more source coders also, so if you have a little exp under your belt than I could use you!
[center]NAME:[/center] [center]AGE:[/center] [center]EXP?:[/center] [center]POSITION:[/center] [center]TIME DEDICATED:[/center]
[center]It would be a plus if you were familiar with FTP because thats what you will be working with. [/center]
[center][size=24pt]ALSO!!!!![/size][/center] [center][size=14pt]IF ACCEPTED YOU WILL BE WORKING WITH DREAMWEAVER CS5 AND IF NEEDED PHOTOSHOP CS5![/size][/center]
Thanks for your time reading this and I hope to hear from you soon!!
[center]NEW PICTURES[/center] [center][IMG]http://i667.photobucket.com/albums/vv34/3m0h4x/homepage-1.jpg[/img][/center] [center][IMG]http://i667.photobucket.com/albums/vv34/3m0h4x/forums-1.jpg[/img][/center] [center][IMG]http://i667.photobucket.com/albums/vv34/3m0h4x/highscores.jpg[/img][/center] [center][IMG]http://i667.photobucket.com/albums/vv34/3m0h4x/serverstatus.jpg[/img][/center]
I set up the forums using smf 2.0. I used the server status page from a tut on moparscape the homepage is new the high scores is a tut from moparscape.

item.title: Pro-Pk Web Devopment team needed
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

yes i still need one lol sorry its been a while. Its an apache server. What other info do you need for it?

You can use what ever you like if your interested. If your more interested using any other software let me know and ill get it. If you both are still interested just pm me because i got lucky seeing this forum again. lol

or did you mean web server? ha and when i posted this a bit ago i liked how someone tried to log in to “anonymous” and “newuser” on my ftp because i deleted those accounts

Read full topic

item.description:

  1. A web developer doesn’t work with what you say but works with what he works the best with.
  2. What kinda server is it tell me more info
  3. Dreamweaver sucks I’d rather use notepad
